pages.text: poppets are handy effigies which can be used for both malicious and protective purposes.$(br2)poppets are always bound to an entity.$(br2)in order to be active, they need to be in your inventory - that is unless you have a poppet shelf.

to bind a poppet, simply combine it with a taglock in a crafting grid.$(br2)the way a bound poppet affects the entity depends greatly on the poppet itself, so make sure to check out the corresponding entries.
